data_table.description: Subject ID, consent group, subject source, and source subject ID of participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Restriction on Use/Storage of DNA & Other
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects
